name: PHASECurveType
desc: Options that apply a mathematical function to an input value.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: A curve that increases uniformly with its input.

items.name: case squared
items.desc: A curve that increases at a rate that squares its input.

items.name: case inverseSquared
items.desc: A curve that increases at a rate of one divided by the input's square.

items.name: case cubed
items.desc: A curve that increases at a rate that cubes its input.

items.name: case inverseCubed
items.desc: A curve that increases at a rate of one divided by the inputâ€™s cube.
